org.intellimate.izou.sdk.frameworks.music.player.template

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.util.AddOnModule
      • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.activator.Activator
        • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.frameworks.music.player.template.PlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Boolean>, ActivatorModel, Identifiable, ContextProvider, FireEvent, Loggable, LoggedExceptionCallback, ExceptionCallback

    public abstract class PlayerController
extends Activator
    you should use this class to control your Player. Use this class even if you don't start/stop in this class. For example if you want to use a 3rd. party library which starts/stops without your interference communicate this with this class. The purpose of this class is not only to stop the Player, but communicate this behaviour to other classes!
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    LeanderKfini
